__comment__max_iters: Number of iterations to do before stopping. -1 means no limit. Default is -1.
__comment__block_frame_length: Number frames to process in memory at a time. -1 means all of the frames. Default is -1.
__comment__include_shift: Whether to export the shifts used, as well. Default is False.
__comment__float_type: Type of float to use during computations. Default is float64.
